summary:
For Conan Fans. Custom Skeleton (big back and arms). Proper Conan Lore. Male and Female

Vampire, werewolf, custom races: all compatible and working.
descriptionHtml:
Like my other race mod, made with - creating a playable race the right way - tutorial. thanks expired:)



XPGamers Conan Mods Video, CaptaonShack is excellent!. Check them out:)

[youtube]d2fLmTyaLS8[/youtube]





~~~~INSTALLATI0N~~~: Use NMM. but make sure the script files are put in right place by double checking your Data folder (You can also check mod first by downloading manually and then adding with NMM). The scripts I made with Racecompatibility.esm ensure the mod is compatible with vampire/werewolf and other custom races. 

To be safe Delete Old version before installing new. Or else just OVERWRITE IF ASKED!!!! 


Cimmerians based off nords and redgaurd abilities:)   Look in pics.....

Height: 1.07.
Mods required to look like pics:  

- Racemenu            http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624
- Better males         http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488
- Apachii                http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
- Conan outfits       http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4793         


CHANGELOG: 1.1 Bigger hands for proper grip of weapons



¬¬¬¬¬Endorsements¬¬¬¬¬¬
Some would be nice:)


Made with Creating a Playable Race the Right way: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165 by Expired.
A big, big thank you to him, his tutorial and excellent helpful mod.
author: GPM26
